mapper.sql: AND (wr_subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR wr_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR wr_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR wr_hashtag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')) ORDER BY wr_datetime DESC
mapper.select: SELECT a.* , b.dm_uid , CASE WHEN a.dm_id=43 THEN 1 WHEN a.dm_id=56 THEN 2 WHEN a.dm_id=44 THEN 3 WHEN a.dm_id=50 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END AS board_sort FROM dm_board a, dm_pages b WHERE 1=1 AND a.dm_id = b.dm_board_id AND b.dm_board_id > 0 AND b.dm_status = '1' AND a.dm_delete_yn = 'N' AND b.dm_delete_yn = 'N' AND a.dm_domain = #{dm_domain} ORDER BY board_sort

SELECT a.wr_subject as wr_subject, a.wr_content as wr_content, a.wr_name as wr_name, a.mb_id as mb_id, a.wr_id as wr_id, a.wr_datetime as wr_datetime, a.wr_hit as wr_hit, a.wr_is_comment as wr_is_comment, a.wr_option as wr_option, a.wr_parent as wr_parent, a.wr_path as wr_path, a.wr_thumb_sub as wr_thumb_sub, a.wr_vol as wr_vol, a.wr_hashtag as wr_hashtag FROM dm_write a WHERE 1=1 AND a.dm_delete_yn = 'N' AND a.wr_reply = '0' AND a.wr_is_comment = '0' AND a.wr_board = #{dm_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dm_write a WHERE 1=1 AND a.dm_delete_yn = 'N' AND a.wr_reply = '0' AND a.wr_is_comment = '0' AND a.wr_board = #{dm_id}
SELECT A.* , IFNULL((SELECT dm_domain_nm FROM dm_domain_list WHERE dm_id = A.dm_domain), '도메인정보없음') as dm_domain_text FROM dm_search_word A WHERE A.dm_id = #{dm_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dm_search_word ( dm_domain , dm_word , dm_count , dm_sort , dm_create_dt ) VALUE ( #{dm_domain} , #{dm_word} , 1 , 0 , now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dm_search_word WHERE 1=1 AND dm_domain = #{dm_domain} ORDER BY dm_sort DESC, dm_count DESC LIMIT 6
